query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `application_history` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  `applicationId` int NOT NULL,
  `fromStatus` varchar(50),
  `toStatus` varchar(50) NOT NULL,
  `changedBy` int,
  `notes` text,
  `emailSent` boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT false,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT (now()),
  CONSTRAINT `application_history_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`),
  CONSTRAINT `application_history_applicationId_fk` FOREIGN KEY (`applicationId`) REFERENCES `applications`(`id`),
  CONSTRAINT `application_history_changedBy_fk` FOREIGN KEY (`changedBy`) REFERENCES `users`(`id`)
);
command:
